FuncDef:
The end-filter command concludes the configuration of a route-filter, exits the route-filter view, and returns to the system view.
By default, no filtering policy is configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Route-filters are used to filter routes based on sets or a single element and modify route attributes of the routes that meet matching rules. To conclude the configuration of a route-filter, exit the route-filter view, and return to the system view, run the end-filter command.
Prerequisites
The content of a route-filter has been configured.
